selected_quotes: Not everyone looks forward to Christmas. And it's particularly hard for those who are estranged from family
Being part of an estranged family at Christmas (as a family ideal few people recognise is banded around in adverts) ht…
A great piece from Dr Lucy Blake
Four out of five people living estranged from a close relative report a positive outcome from their experience
Of interest: 'Christmas is the hardest time of year for those estranged from close family' #christmas #relationships

citation.abstract: A new survey of people living estranged from a parent, sibling or adult child has found many feel judged or blamed for their family breakdown.
citation.title: Christmas is the hardest time of year for those estranged from close family

news.title: How to start healing those Brexit family rifts
news.summary: University of Cambridge (via noodls) / It has been an emotional month for many in the UK.

news.title: How to start healing those Brexit family rifts
news.summary: It has been an emotional month for many in the UK. After the sadness and anger that followed the tragic murder of MP Jo Cox, many people now feel fearful and apprehensive as the consequences of the EU referendum begin to reveal themselves.

news.title: Opinion: How to start healing those Brexit family rifts
news.summary: It has been an emotional month for many in the UK. After the sadness and anger that followed the tragic murder of MP Jo Cox, many people now feel fearful and apprehensive as the consequences of the EU referendum begin to reveal themselves.
